item.description:
This week's mileage:

Nike/Hartford Half  :     7 Miles

Nike/Hartford Full   :   10 Miles

 

Since this is a step-back week I'm going to take a day off and head to Maine for the weekend.  I'll leave it on the calender in case people still want to meet and run together.  I'd suggest a nice easy trail run from the parking lot to Mt. Sanford Road and back for the 7 miler and to Lock 12 Park at Higgins Road for the 10 miler.  You can carry water if needed, there is also a water fountain on the right just about 1.75 miles from the lot that the 7 milers can use in each direction and another one just before the park for the 10 milers.
item.how_to_find_us: Easy to spot in Parking Lot across from Quinnipiac York Hill Campus
item.name: Hamden Trail Run
